assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: DM-KER Nyilvánosan Muködo Részvénytársaság engages in the distribution and servicing of agricultural and construction machinery in Hungary. The company provides various construction machines, including asphalt cutters, demolition hammers, articulated dump trucks, skid steer loaders, bogie telescopes, wheel loaders, wheeled excavators, rollers, belt loaders, long reach chain excavators, industrial telescopes, compact track loaders, medium chain excavators, mini excavators, midi excavators, mobile screening machines, large chain excavators, telescopic loaders, compaction compactors, road construction machinery, and vibratory rollers. It also offers agricultural machines, such as grinders, power harrows, compact track loaders, self-propelled and trailed feed distribution wagons, self - propelled field sprayers, compact loaders, fertilizer spreaders, grape and fruit sprayers, bale unloading and distribution wagons, bale wagons, telescopic loaders, thick and seed drills, chisels, organic manure spreaders, and wheel loaders. In addition, the company provides a range of spare parts for various agricultural and construction machines; machine rental services; financing service for buying machines; and maintenance, warranty, and repair services. Further, it offers waste management machinery services. The company distributes its products under the Agrifac, Bobcat, Arbos, F.lli.Annovi, Doosan, Dynapac, Epiroc, Knegt, Kuhn, Storti, Viking, Weycor, and Willibald brands. The company is headquartered in Szigetszentmiklós, Hungary.
